title: weird unknown error
body: I just had a guy invite me to a game with a name I didn't recognize on my list. So I hovered over his name and it shows it loading his details but nothing loads. So I right click to view profile and it gives me an "Unknown error message", but instead of giving me this persons profile, it gives me another random person profile on my list. Never had this issue before, it seems pretty random though.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you experienced this issue since? Are you able to reproduce this reliably?
